p.k: From the Pays Basque to Catalonia
p.d: Crossing the Pyrenees from east to west aboard small local trains with a delightful yesteryear charm. En-route for the summit of La Rhune, aboard the rack-and-pinion railway of the same name. The `Artouste' train, highest in Europe, follows the mountainside. After Toulouse, our journey ends aboard the famous Yellow Train... Directed by: Brice Martinelli (France, 2019)
